column4: please help! I am no longer able to boot my computer. When I boot the computer in recovery mode, I get an error message that says "ALERT! /dev/disk/by-uuid/5b2aaca6-44f3-475a-8d36-9530b7a64e79 does not exist. Dropping to a shell! Check your root= boot arguement (cat /proc/cmdline) Check for missing modules (cat /rpc/cmdline), or device files (ls /dev)

please help! I am no longer able to boot my computer. When I boot the computer in recovery mode, I get an error message that says "ALERT! /dev/disk/by-uuid/5b2aaca6-44f3-475a-8d36-9530b7a64e79 does not exist. Dropping to a shell! Check your root= boot arguement (cat /proc/cmdline) Check for missing modules (cat /rpc/cmdline), or device files (ls /dev)" what do I do?
